abstract: Judge Terry P Lewis of Florida's Second Circuit Court in Leon County, Fla, postpones ruling on state's unfinished congressional redistricting map after Republican legislative leaders failed to agree on redrawing boundaries; says he need approval of Florida Supreme Court, which ruled that current map was unconstitutional.
lead_paragraph: The Florida Legislature has been unable to agree on a redistricting plan; the state Supreme Court has ruled the current congressional map unconstitutional.

headline.main: Judge Doesn’t Settle Bitter Dispute Over Florida’s Redistricting Plan
headline.print_headline: Judge Doesn’t Settle Bitter Dispute Over Florida’s Redistricting Plan

snippet: The Florida Legislature has been unable to agree on a redistricting plan; the state Supreme Court has ruled the current congressional map unconstitutional.
